# Welcome to the website of Noni Pinales
## Thanks for stopping by!

Noni Pinales is a Research Coordinator at the PTSD Research and Treatment Program at Case Western Reserve University. She coordinates a multi-site trial evaluating a novel PTSD intervention. 

She is also currently expanding her research skills by pursuing a Master of Science in Clinical Research at Case Western Reserve University. Noni's research interests lie in mechanism and intervention research for OCD and PTSD. 

Please feel free to [contact me](mailto:mail.nxs1002@case.edu) if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential collaborations. 

Noni built this Github website in R and thanks Marvin Schmitt for the template.
